71910.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「かみさま かみさま:
<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>Oh, God. Oh, God. Please forgive Sister
Satella.

69434.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「……ようこそ。:
Welcome to the Toolsmith Guild. I am the Guildmaster of the Toolsmith Guild, or Guildmaster Barex. A Toolsmith is a person who
possesses miraculous skills in creating the tools used by craftsmen. In other words, a god-like being who reigns over all craftsmen.
But you seem to be in possession of a mysterious blacksmith's table. Where did you receive such a valuable item? If you have it,
then you don't need to be in the care of the various craftsmen's guilds in this world. It's a little sad for us, though. If I could give
you a little advice, it would be to learn the art of blacksmithing. As you get higher in blacksmithing level, you will learn various
skills, but I recommend that you first increase your firepower and then use a skill that allows you to hit several squares at the
same time. It depends on the shape of the square. But you need to be careful not to get carried away and get too much of it. Well, as
the saying goes, "practice makes perfect.

69476.<attr><feel_happy_lv2><end_attr>「あら いらっし:
Hello, you're here. This is the Pot Alchemy Guild. I am Paulia, the Guild Master, and your name is ! Perhaps you came to see
me because you are interested in Pot Alchemy? What is Pot Alchemy? It's an amazing technology that adds various alchemical
effects to already existing equipment after the fact! For example, it increases attack power, critical rate, weapon guard rate, and
so on. For example, attack power, critical rate, weapon guard rate, etc. These effects are usually added to weapons that mainly
attack directly. However, I've been a bit busy lately. I can't accept requests from travelers like you. We've also stopped recruiting new
craftsmen. I'm really swamped with work. I'm sorry you had to come all this way. Please feel free to visit the guild, talk to our
craftsmen, and take your time to poke around Pot Alchemy's facilities!

42143.「港町レンドアに訪れた 冒険者から\n 他の大陸の 話を聞くのが\n わしの 何:
I am most excited to hear stories of other continents from adventurers who visit Port Town Lendor. It's been a long time since I
came to live here, but I used to be an adventurer who traveled the world. Ho-ho-ho. How fondly I remember.

189163.青い木箱が 置かれている。: A blue crate has been placed.

189157.ブルーの木箱が 置かれている。\nスギム局長が言っていた 特別便の積荷のようだ。:
There is a blue crate on the floor, which
looks like the special shipment that Director
Sugimu mentioned. Would you like to take it?<yesno><break>

189159.スギム局長が言っていた 特別便の木箱があるが\nこれ以上は 持てないようだ……。:
Director Sugimu said that we have a special shipping crate, but it looks like we can't hold any more. Let's take the crate we have to
the Ship Bureau first!

51021.「ボクは ロンデ。\n 悪いファーラットじゃないロン！\n 勇気ある冒険者を 探:
I'm Ronde, not a bad Feralball! I'm looking for a brave adventurer! I used to live in a different world from Astoltia. My hometown was
a very fun and fuzzy world called Fluffy Utopia. But a long time ago, when the Demon King was defeated in my world, his companions
came into my world and turned Utopia into a Magic Maze that changes its structure every time you enter, and they settled there as Maze
Bosses! That's why I'm asking you to find brave adventurers like you and help me defeat the evil Maze Boss! To enter the Magic Maze,
you need a Maze Coin. To enter the Magic Maze, you need the Maze Coins. Just talk to Dorothy next to you with the coins and you will be
able to enter the maze! If you receive the labyrinth coins on your way, please try Magic Maze. Thank you very much for your
cooperation!

165947.どうやら <pc>は\nリンクスの手元にある メガルーラストーンを\n問題なく:
Apparently <pc> was able to use Mega
Zoomstone in Lynx's hands without any
problems.<bw_break>

165948.グランゼドーラ王国の 宿屋にいる\nリンクスに報告しよう！: Report to Lynx at the Gran Zedora Kingdom Inn!

67472.「この町の方も 旅の方も\n 皆さん レンダーシアに行ける日を\n 首を長くして:
I know that everyone in town and on the road is waiting with bated breath for the day when we can visit Lendersia. I hear that the ferry
has been fixed, and I'll be here praying for a safe trip.

67473.「定期船の運航が 再開しましたね。\n レンダーシアに行ける日を 多くの方々が\:
The liner service has resumed. Many of you have been waiting for the day when you can go to Lendersia. I will continue to pray for
everyone's safe journey to Lendersia.

35944.「申し訳ありませんが 仕事中の雑談は\n 規則で 禁じられておりますので\n カ:
I'm sorry, but chatting while working is
forbidden by regulation, so please talk to us
from in front of the counter.

35945.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「このレンドア北:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>There is a Toolsmith Guild and Pot Alchemy
Guild just north of Lendor. If you are
interested, you can go there.

35946.「ようこそ 旅の方。\n 旅の休息を お考えでしたら\n ぜひ 当店を ご利用く:
Welcome, travelers. If you are thinking of
taking a break from your travels, please visit
us.

115953.「はじめまして 冒険者さん。\n 私 悪いベホマスライムじゃないですよ！\n<b:
Nice to meet you, Adventurer. I am not a bad Cureslime! I have dreamed of serving the god Dharma for a long time, and I have just
recently been accepted as a priest after undergoing rigorous training! I wondered why I was sent to this place, but after actually
coming here, I was convinced. I was wondering why I was sent to this place, but after actually coming here, it makes sense now. I
will do my best to be of service to adventurers. I look forward to working with you.

35947.「あたしが生まれる ずーっと前は\n ここは 漁業の村だったんだ。\n 今となっ:
Long before I was born, this used to be a fishing village. Nowadays, there are no more vestiges of it. But now that it's a famous
port town, I've been able to meet people from other races, and I like Lendor the way it is now.

44642.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「便せんに使われ:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>The paper used for the letter paper is
carefully milled one by one by us, Elf. Please
use it carefully.

35948.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「海って ちょー:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>The sea is a bit big, isn't it? Since it's so
big, whoever made it must be huge too.

35950.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「あれれ おかし:
<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>Oh, no, something is wrong. I don't see a ship
anywhere. Oh, no, the port is just south of
Lendor. Oh no, we're wrong.

35951.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「うおお 腰がぁ……:
Oh, my back. I suddenly stood up and got a gimpy back. After all, the long train ride must have taken its toll. I'm the oldest of
the Kunai.

35952.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「空って 青いし:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>The sky is blue, just like the sea. And the
clouds are fish. When the fish disappear, it
rains.

35953.「この店の セキュリティは完璧ですので\n お預かりした お荷物の盗難や紛失など:
Our security is so complete that we've never
had a single case of theft or loss of checked
baggage.

35954.<attr><feel_angry_lv1><end_attr>「ここでは お客:
We handle important personal information here, such as customer letters and address lists. It's not allowed to come in here without
permission.

35955.「この見渡す限りの 大海原と\n エルトナ大陸の 大森林……。\n どちらも 大:
The ocean as far as the eye can see and the great forest of Eltona Continent. Both are symbols of nature. As I gaze out over the
ocean, I feel grateful for nature's bounty and am reminded of how small I am.

35956.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「あたしったら:
We were just here on a trip, but we felt so at home that we found ourselves living in this town. And before I knew it, I had become a
Sister. It was all God's will, wasn't it?

209879.「あたし 悪いモーモンじゃないモン。\n モンスター酒場で ご主人を待ってたんだ:
I'm not bad Teeny Sanguini. I was waiting for the master at the Monster Tavern, but he never came back. So I took advantage of my free time
and got certified as a Monster Manager! I heard that many travelers visit Mokomoko Park, so I thought I might be able to meet the
master if I work here! I'm going to be useful to everyone! So I'm coming in!

35957.<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「レンダーシアに:
<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>There is a beautiful beach in Lendersia.
Cocolata Beach, I think it's called. I fell in
love there a lot when I was young<heart>.

35958.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「この町にいても:
There's nothing to do in this town, so I've been feeling a little tense lately. When I grow up, I'm going to leave this town and
stand on my own.

35959.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「そうだ ボクに:
Yes, I know what I'm talking about. The best comedian you've never seen is waiting for you at Lendersia. I tried to say it in a casual
way, but you never know until you go there, right?

35960.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「いかん いかん。\:
No, no, no. My back is not getting better. It will take a while. It seems that lack of exercise is to blame. I must rehabilitate
myself for the adventure to the new place.

35961.<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>「空って 青いし:
<attr><feel_happy_lv3><end_attr>The sky is blue, just like the sea. And the
clouds are fish. I want to see more kinds of
fish.

35962.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「私 最近 絵を:
I have recently started painting. I'm going to start painting and capturing the landscapes of my travels and collecting memories of the
great outdoors. I wonder what kind of nature there is in Lendersia?

35963.「この町の方も 旅の方も\n 皆さん レンダーシアに行ける日を\n 首を長くして:
I know that everyone in this town and those traveling are waiting for the day when they can visit Lendersia. I'll be here praying for
the liner to be fixed soon.
